VARIABLE_DESCRIPTION: Unique identifier for each business record
Country where the business is located (Eswatini/Lesotho/Malawi/Zimbabwe)
Age of the business owner in years
Owner attitude: Country will have a stable business environment in the future
Owner attitude: Worried that the business will shut down
Business complies with or acts in accordance with income tax regulations
Owner perception: Insurance does not cover the kinds of losses the business suffers
Owner perception: Cannot afford insurance payments
Total monthly personal income of the owner before tax and other deductions
Approximate monthly or annual expenses of the business in local currency
Approximate annual turnover/revenue of the business in local currency
Number of years the business owner has been running this business
Business has or uses motor vehicle insurance
Business uses mobile money account
Currently facing cash flow problems in business operations
Business has access to or uses a cell phone
Gender/sex of the business owner
Whether the business offers goods or services on credit to customers
Owner attitude: Satisfied with what has been achieved so far in the business
Business uses credit card for business purposes
Whether the business keeps financial records
Owner perception: Insurance companies do not insure businesses like this one
Owner perception: Insurance is important for the business
Whether the business has any kind of insurance
Whether the business was considered an essential service provider during COVID-19
Owner attitude: Believes the business will be more successful in the next year
Faced problem with sourcing money when starting or taking over the business
Business uses word of mouth as a method of marketing or advertising
Business has a loan account or short-term loan from formal financial institution
Business uses internet banking services
Business uses bank debit card (e.g. Visa Electron)
Business is likely to face risk of theft of business stock in the future
Number of additional months (beyond full years) the business has been operating
Business has or uses medical aid or medical scheme insurance
Business has or uses funeral plan or cover insurance
Motivation to start the business: To make more money or provide for family
Business uses informal financial product: friends and family savings or borrowing
Business borrows from informal money lender
Target variable: Financial Health Index score or classification of the business
